title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.15 - Agreements between issuer and state comptroller
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.15 - Agreements between issuer and state comptroller

State Regulations

The State Comptroller may enter into written agreements
with an issuer of sinking fund bonds with respect to the sinking fund accounts
of such issuer. Such agreements may include provisions with respect to those
matters set forth in section
22.10
(d)(7)(b)
of
the Local Finance Law and in sections
38.3, 38.5 and
38.7
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
38.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
